acquisitions MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif.- Google Chief Executive Officer Eric Schmidt has doubled the anticipated pace of acquisitions this year and expects to maintain that rate after some internal projects have failed to spur growth. The opportunities are there, Eric Schmidt said in an interview from the company's Mountain View, Calif., headquarters last week. "We can afford it. We're in a mode of investment for the long term."
